title: Why Holding Cash Makes You POORER: Inflation & Exchange Rate Secrets
description:
Discover why simply holding cash might be making you poorer than you think! 

In this video, we break down two major forces that silently erode your wealth: inflation and exchange rates. You'll learn how inflation reduces your purchasing power and how currency fluctuations can impact your savings, especially if you have international goals or buy imported goods.

We explore the dangerous 'double whammy' when inflation and exchange rates work together, and reveal practical strategies to protect and grow your money.

Plus, we discuss the rare but important situations when holding cash *is* actually the right move.
